title: HOOD CREW Men’s Long Sleeve Polo Shirt Casual Slim Fit Shirts Contrast Color Patchwork T Shirts Cotton Tops
description: 【Fabric】: 65% cotton, 35% polyester, soft, breathable, lightweight, comfortable to wear all day

【FEATURES】: Mixed color design, turn down collar with zipper, pull on closure, slim fit, long sleeve, classic design. Great buy for yourself or as a gift/birthday present for your friends/sons/husbands
【FIT】: Regular slim fit, if you prefer loose style, you could choose size larger than usual
【Occasion】: Daily life, home, school, office , golf, work , vacation and many other places. Good match with casual pants, jeans, jackets for a stylish look
【CARE】: Hand wash or machine wash with cold water (Hand wash recommend) . Hang dry
